table.name: vte_sla_policies
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vte_sla_policies` ( `slaid` int(19) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `policy_name` varchar(255) NOT NULL, `module` varchar(255), `picklist_field` varchar(255), `display_slalog` varchar(25), `status` varchar(255), `picklist_value` varchar(255), `time` int(11), `typetime` varchar(255), `conditions` text, PRIMARY KEY (`slaid`), INDEX(`slaid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=1 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8;

table.name: vte_sla_actions
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vte_sla_actions` ( `id` int(19) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `slaid` int(19) NOT NULL, `action_name` varchar(255) NOT NULL, `type` varchar(255), `trigger` varchar(255), `trigger_time` varchar(255), `trigger_typetime` varchar(255) , `user` varchar(255) , `type_id` varchar(255) , `sequence` int(19), PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=1 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8;

table.name: vte_sla_actions_records
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vte_sla_actions_records` ( `id` int(19) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `slaid` int(19) NOT NULL, `sla_actionsid` int(19) NOT NULL, `crmid` int(19) NOT NULL, `type` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=1 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8;

table.name: vte_sla_businesshour
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vte_sla_businesshour` ( `busihourid` int(11) NOT NULL, `start_time` time, `end_time` time, `status` int(10), `week_day` varchar(255), PRIMARY KEY (`busihourid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8;

table.name: vte_sla_businesshour_holiday
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vte_sla_businesshour_holiday` ( `holidayid` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `holiday_name` varchar(255), `holiday_date` date, `default` varchar(10), PRIMARY KEY (`holidayid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=1 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8;

table.name: vte_sla_related_rel
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vte_sla_related_rel` ( `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `slaid` int(11) , `crmid` int(11), `count_time_seconds` int(11), `time_changeon` datetime, `status` varchar(50), PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=1 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8;

table.name: vteslapolicies_settings
vte_modules
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vte_modules` ( `module` varchar(50) NOT NULL , `valid` int(1) NULL , PRIMARY KEY (`module`));

table.name: vte_sla_actions_records
vte_sla_actions_records
table.sql: ALTER TABLE `vte_sla_actions_records` ADD COLUMN `time` datetime ;

table.name: vte_sla_actions_records
table.sql: ALTER TABLE `vte_sla_actions_records` ADD COLUMN `sla_action_count_time` int(11) ;

table.name: vte_sla_actions_records
table.sql: ALTER TABLE `vte_sla_actions_records` ADD COLUMN `sla_action_status` varchar(10) ;

table.name: vte_sla_related_rel
table.sql: ALTER TABLE `vte_sla_related_rel` ADD COLUMN `complete` int(5) ;

table.name: vte_sla_policies
table.sql: ALTER TABLE `vte_sla_policies` ADD COLUMN `exclude_field` varchar(255) AFTER `picklist_field`;

table.name: vte_sla_policies
table.sql: ALTER TABLE `vte_sla_policies` ADD COLUMN `exclude_fieldvalue` varchar(255) AFTER `exclude_field`;

table.name: vte_sla_policies
table.sql: ALTER TABLE `vte_sla_policies` ADD COLUMN `business_hour` varchar(10) AFTER `conditions`;

table.name: vte_sla_policies
table.sql: ALTER TABLE `vte_sla_policies` ADD COLUMN `fulfillment_values` varchar(255) AFTER `business_hour`;

table.name: vte_sla_policies
table.sql: ALTER TABLE vte_sla_policies ADD COLUMN modifiedtime datetime;

table.name: vte_sla_startid
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vte_sla_startid` (`startid` int(19) DEFAULT NULL)

table.name: vte_sla_related_rel
table.sql: ALTER TABLE `vte_sla_related_rel` ADD INDEX `idx_slaid`(`slaid`), ADD INDEX `idx_crmid`(`crmid`);
